definitions.definition: Impractical people are not naturally good at doing useful jobs such as making or repairing things.
Impractical arrangements, ideas, or methods cannot be done or used easily or effectively:
examples: It's impractical to have so many people all trying to use this equipment at the same time.

definitions.definition: Impractical clothes, devices, etc. cause problems when used in normal situations:
examples: I love high heels but they're rather impractical.
